Title: Ciao, Professore!
Writer: Alessandro Bencivenni, Leonardo Benvenuti, Marcello D'Orta (novel), Piero De Bernardi, Andrej Longo (dialogue), Domenico Saverni, Lina Wertmüller
Actors: Paolo Villaggio, Isa Danieli, Gigio Morra, Sergio Solli
Plot: A teacher must deal with the underworld of Naples and the family problems of his students.
